attributes.action: stop Asda stocking American size 0 (size 4 UK) clothes for teenagers and women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Asda are going to stock size 0 clothes (equivalent of age 7) for teenagers and women. These have a miniscule 22" waist. This is very irresponsible and could cause anorexia or promote it or help anorexic women stay that way. It should not be allowed for size 0 clothes to be stocked!
